title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: 2014 Microsoul 0.05BTC silver coin #406 of 1000There were only about 140 of this type of coin made, not 1000The coin is not loaded according to the blockchain:"1HD6R7fn"STARTING BID: 0.0000BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT: 0.0001BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: AUGUST 25th, 2022, 13:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending timeIf within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the that lot from the time of that bid.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preference

comments.body: 0.0000 BTCcant walk away without doing the starting bid at least

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: 0.008A question regarding microsouls: Were they all not-loaded from the start on or were some sweeped later on?I don't know much about the history, just have in the back of my mind, they were "scam related somehow".

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Quote from: Kryptowerk on August 22, 2022, 02:37:00 PMA question regarding microsouls: Were they all not-loaded from the start on or were some sweeped later on?I don't know much about the history, just have in the back of my mind, they were "scam related somehow".I am not sure about this particular run from them, but overall it was just poor key management... some coins public and private keys got mixed upDon't think they were swept.. I'm sure some other collectors could chime in and tell us if their coin like this are loaded or not.Quote from: Kryptowerk on August 22, 2022, 02:37:00 PM0.008Current high bid
